title: This has to be intentional by now. i don't understand
body:
So everytime i go to my parents house to play league, they have this tiny box that contain the internet
https://goo.gl/5n1HKO
this little box that connects internet by 4G instead of a WLAN.

This thing intentionally has to be screwing me over, i dont get it at all. 
Every norms game i play, Packet loss up the butt. i cant see the minions move, cant see skillshots, cant buy items at the store, cant upgrade my skills, cant see ppl respawn or die, cant pretty much do anything than just walk around.

and THIS IS ONLY NORMS, NOTHING ELSE, aram has had it happen once or twice but it has stopped. FGM and Ranked, nope nada. its pissing me the god damn off im about to rip my hair out. i cant have ONE DAMN CHILL GAME OF NORMS without having to reconnect everytime i kill a minion leading to my laner getting easy farm and destroying my other allies. thus leading me getting reported. this is so unfair, i didnt do anything to deserve this. i just want a nice game of league..

http://i.imgur.com/m9VSMbP.png
Last game's network log.

replies.body: It's really strange that you'd have to connect through 4G, so I'm curious if maybe there is an issue with the device or anything else that may be connected to it.  IF you also have a few different routers around your network then you could be bouncing around a bit.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will look into this individually with you to see what we can find.  We'll get back to you!

Our tech team will look into this individually with you to see what we can find.  We'll get back to you!

Hopefully the support ticket helps to find out what might be the problem so it doesnt get worse. Lately due to the anger i get on with this problem, ive kinda gotten toxic towards questioning people asking why i keep reconnecting and just through uncontrollable anger, it just comes out with a little too far toxicity and i really dont want to be mean to ppl or toxic or anything so im hoping to get this fixed before it leads to bans on my account. Really dont want to lose this account after spending so much on it and the first ban popping up.
